title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 511.1 - Authority and purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 511.1 - Authority and purpose

State Regulations

This Part is adopted pursuant to section
8-0113, subdivision 3 of the Environmental Conservation Law (ECL). Purpose is to
implement provisions of the ECL which provide for State Environmental Quality

Review (SEQR) of actions directly undertaken by the Division of Military and

Naval Affairs (DMNA). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
511.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
